segments.text: Will you bring our bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , certainly . I'll be back in a minute.Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Let me see . I think there's a mistake on the bill here . Would you mind checking , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . Let me check . Oh , you seem to be correct .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only ten percent of taxes included in the bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then 100 US dollars covers everything , doesn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1
